children.title: Long Ago
children.message:
Welcome to Long Ago!
{COLOR=GREEN}WASD{CLEARCOLOR}: Movement
{COLOR=CORAL}1,...,9{CLEARCOLOR}: cast skills
{COLOR=GREEN}E{CLEARCOLOR}: Pick item up
{COLOR=CORAL}F{CLEARCOLOR}: Continue/fast forward dialog
{COLOR=GREEN}I{CLEARCOLOR}: Inventory
{COLOR=CORAL}C{CLEARCOLOR}: Equipment
{COLOR=GREEN}K{CLEARCOLOR}: Skills
{COLOR=CORAL}P{CLEARCOLOR}: Attributes
{COLOR=GREEN}F{CLEARCOLOR}: Talk to NPC (quest giving npc's)
